摻假.definition: to mix in fake material; to adulterate

摻和.definition: to mix; to put together; to interfere in; to get involved in

摻水.definition: to dilute; to water down; watered down

摻沙子.definition: to mix in some sand (e.g. when making concrete); (fig.) to place outsiders into a monolithic group (to infiltrate or disrupt it etc)
